snippet.title: The Crew Ultimate Edition Trailer [NA]
snippet.description:
Tear up the streets, sky and surf with The Crew 2 on June 29th, 2018!
 Watch the release date announcement video: https://youtu.be/17GjieBtaB0
 Sign Up for Beta Access: http://ubi.li/jv4kv
  
 https://www.thecrewgame.com 
 https://www.facebook.com/thecrewgame.usa 
 https://www.instagram.com/thecrewgame 
 https://twitter.com/thecrewgame 
 https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
  
Discover all our The Crew products and exclusive items on the Ubisoft Store: https://ubi.li/xs9g5

 The Crew® Ultimate Edition is the ultimate driving experience, including:
 - The Crew®
 - The Crew® Season Pass
 - The Crew® Wild Run
 - The Crew® Calling All Units
 Coming November 29!
 
 Existing players of The Crew will be able to pick up The Crew Calling All Units on November 29 including both The Crew Wild Run and The Crew Calling All Units expansions, plus the bonus Nissan GT-R for previous owners of The Crew Wild Run!
 
 The Crew Calling All Units is the second major expansion of the revolutionary action-driving game, The Crew. Discover endless opportunities in the open world USA, from prizes in “The Summit” events to police chases and new story missions. If you choose the police, arrest your enemies and conquer the roads with indestructible cop vehicles and motorbikes. If you choose the street racers, steal new cargo for never-before-seen rewards. Whichever side you choose, you won’t be disappointed. Don’t miss out on the action! 
  
 The Crew Ultimate Edition Trailer [NA]
 https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
